channel.title: Notable items?
channel.description: How can I make it so certain items can be stackable? I don't know if this is changed through the client or the server, but I remember seeing something about stackable items in the cache suite I used. (It wouldn't let me change the item configs for some reason...)

item.title: Notable items?
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

How can I make it so certain items can be stackable?
I don’t know if this is changed through the client or the server, but I remember seeing something about stackable items in the cache suite I used. (It wouldn’t let me change the item configs for some reason…)

Read full topic
